definition: to hang or suspend/to worry/public announcement/unresolved/baseless/without foundation

sentences.english: Hovering over the Chat Frame and using the mouse wheel will allow players to scroll through chat text.
sentences.chinese: ◦鼠標懸停在聊天框可以用鼠標滾輪捲動聊天記錄了。

sentences.english: “Soft” hover effects often support the navigation design by making browsing more pleasant.
sentences.chinese: 導航設計中的鼠標懸停效果會讓瀏覽變得更愉快。

sentences.english: When hovering, it would look great if sunbeams came out of it or it glowed from behind.
sentences.chinese: 當一個人在按鈕上懸停它應該看起來更加鼓舞人心。

sentences.english: Hovering over the Upgrade button on theFacility Context Menu will display stats for the next level.
sentences.chinese: 鼠標懸停在升級按鈕上會顯示下一個級別的特性。

sentences.english: Mousing over menus brings up not just options to click, but full-blown images and option lists.
sentences.chinese: 菜單懸停不僅是點擊選項，還有完整圖片和選項列表。

sentences.english: A greater spear-nosed bat hovers at a blossom.
sentences.chinese: 一隻矛吻蝠懸停在一朵花上。

sentences.english: Icons slightly expand when you hover over them on the taskbar.
sentences.chinese: 當你把鼠標懸停在任務欄圖標上時，圖標會稍微變大。

sentences.english: ''Hovering directly above Mars limits communications to just one polar region.
sentences.chinese: 直接懸停在火星，就把通訊限制在僅一個極區。

sentences.english: The Walkera is very strong in fig 8's and stall turns in Nor flight.
sentences.chinese: 在平飛狀態做8字飛行和懸停時，華科爾非常強勢。

sentences.english: ON THE WING The wake of a hovering rufous hummingbird, top.
sentences.chinese: 棕煌蜂鳥懸停時引發的尾流。

sentences.english: Use tooltip on mouseover for trayicon showing track metadata
sentences.chinese: 使用跟蹤的鼠標懸停提示來顯示托盤圖標。

sentences.english: Hovering over variables in the source code shows their contents.
sentences.chinese: 在源代碼內的變量上懸停則會顯示其內容。

sentences.english: This makes the quadrocopter hang steady in the air.
sentences.chinese: 這個平衡使得四軸飛行器在空中平穩懸停。

definition: to close (flower, eyes, suitcase etc)/to bring together/(insect or bird when not flying) to fold (its wings)
lit. crow and peacock make no sound/absolute silence (idiom); not a single voice can be heard/absolute silence
(bird species of China) grey heron (Ardea cinerea)
